tweet: UCLA QB Kevin Prince has a sprained right shoulder and is questionable to return.
Chatted with the Holiday Bowl rep on site tonight, he confirmed that Nebraska is the likely Big 12 participant at this point.
Linebacker Akeem Ayers has been everywhere for UCLA tonight. He almost jumped a Barkley pass intended for Anthony McCoy.
Joe McKnight inching closer to 1,000 yards rushing. He's got 42 yards on 11 carries so far.
UCLA mega-stud defensive tackle Brian Price limps off. Not good.
